metadata.title: Jose Goncalves e Janir Martins - Seu Mane Luiz
metadata.creator: Jose Goncalves e Janir Martins
metadata.description: Singers Jose Goncalves and Janir Martins with the Guarda Vilha Orchestra perform the traditional Brazilian tune "Seu Mane Luiz" in this recording from circa 1942. The flute solo is by Pixinguinha. From the original 78rpm disk.
metadata.subject: Brazil; Brazilian; folk; traditional; world music; 78rpm
